page.title: 05Railway Survey
page.content:
(Continued from previous page) {Estimate of importance of the railway to Bromley} Essential 332 141 Necessary 334 113 Unimportant 31 18
The majority(311) of parents who travel to work by train go to a station in London,with a further 35 parents using a station between London and Bromley.
Children's main reasons for using the train is for day trips, with only 167 taking the train when they go on holiday. The survey shows 146 children using the train to travel to school.
Although now more people have cars, 95% of the children questioned think that the railway is important for Bromley.
